description: Xunlu, spherical censor with 4" chain and hook; floral and curvilinear design with cut-out; opens at center; latch with hook closure; movable hanging bowl inside; has storage box.
text: This delicate, silver censer is designed to be carried by Buddhist priests in ritual ceremonies. It is structured with a gimbel mechanism that, acting like a gyroscope, keeps the burning incense level and upright as the censer is swung during ceremonies or as it is moved around a room. The decoration includes bunches of grapes on a vine.
title: Spherical Censer
